clintock:BindKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Binding a nucleotide puts it in your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your existing nucleotides form an amino acid and join the peptide chain.

clintock:CytosineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Deals damage to a random enemy.

clintock:Nucleotide.DESCRIPTION: One of four organic molecules used in synthesizing amino acids (adenine, cytosine, guanine, thymine).

clintock:ToolKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Tools are cards that lose an element of randomness when upgraded.
